body: Thanks,   Hell is now waiting for me
Should have reported that asshole manager to corporate and get his ass fired and arrested. And don't forget the compensation money. But not before kicking his ass.
I think my brain hurts with how stupid that plot was...

I just noticed she ended up in the recycle crap...did her (ex-)husband throw her in there when she tried to follow after him? lol Still the "only good thing about him(husband) was his dick" shows just how much she didn't really love him...which is why it was so easy for her to fall like the asshole manager commented about. Speaking of the manager...Ryo should have beat his face in after before throwing his soon to be ex-wife in the trash.
Yes this ending is what i want in every ntr

Somehow I can't stop being flabbergasted at the fact that the husband seems to be working at a supermarket and the wife is selling herself so he can get a manager position with the help of someone who's not even his boss but another manager but yeah it's hentai and gotta earn that extra 5$ per day with the help of someone who can't even guarentee the new position.
